epics.name: Manage Orders
epics.purpose: Handle order lifecycle from creation to fulfillment

features.name: Place Order
features.purpose: Allow customers to create and submit orders

concepts.name: Order
concepts.description: Customer purchase request with items and payment

concepts.name: Cart
concepts.description: Temporary collection of items before order creation

behaviors.behavior: Order is created when customer submits cart
Payment is validated before order confirmation

stories.name: Customer places order
behavioral_ac: When customer submits order, then system validates payment information
When payment is valid, then system creates order with unique ID
When order is created, then system sends confirmation email to customer

scenarios.name: Happy path order placement
steps: Given customer has items in cart
When customer submits order with valid payment

scenarios.name: Invalid payment
steps: Given customer has items in cart
When customer submits order with invalid payment
And system displays payment error message

stories.name: System validates payment
behavioral_ac: When payment information is provided, then system checks payment method validity
When payment method is valid, then system authorizes payment amount
When authorization succeeds, then system reserves funds for order

stories.name: System calculates order total
behavioral_ac: When items are in cart, then system calculates subtotal
When subtotal is calculated, then system applies applicable taxes
When taxes are applied, then system calculates final total

stories.name: System applies discount codes
behavioral_ac: When customer enters discount code, then system validates code
When code is valid, then system applies discount to order total

stories.name: Customer reviews order before submission
behavioral_ac: When customer views order summary, then system displays all items and totals
When customer confirms order, then system proceeds to payment

features.name: Track Order Status
features.purpose: Provide visibility into order processing and delivery

epics.name: Manage Products
epics.purpose: Enable product catalog management and browsing

solution.name: E-Commerce Platform
solution.purpose: Enable customers to browse, purchase, and manage orders online
